title: Blended Learning Foundational Competency Enhancement Course for Secondary Science Teachers Aged 40+

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A program focused on designing and operating blended learning in smartphone-based environments for learners without PC access.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more core elements of blended learning (integration of face-to-face and non-face-to-face methods).
Learners can independently design one smartphone-based microlearning content.
Learners can propose three or more solutions for technical issues (e.g., access failures) that may occur in blended learning environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
